channel.title: EnSQL Reference on Ensign Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in EnSQL Reference on Ensign Documentation

item.title: Query Operators
item.description: EnSQL supports a subset of standard operators that are defined in SQL:1999. Operators include comparison operators and logical/boolean operators. Comparison Operators Comparison operators are used to evaluate an expression that is composed of a left-side (e.g. a in the examples below), the operator, and the right-side (e.g. b in the examples below). These operators are typically used in the WHERE clause of a query for filtering results returned in an Ensign stream.
